it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.requests

Class ChoiceRequest<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.requests.ChoiceRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of objects representing the choices the player can make
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionRequest, BoardRequest, EffectRequest, PlayerOperationRequest, PlayerRequest, PowerupCardRequest, SkullCountRequest, SquareRequest, WeaponCardRequest

    public abstract class ChoiceRequest<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An abstract class representing a request to choose between various alternatives, made to a player. The player must then choose one of the alternatives (or even none of them, if isOptional() returns true. The request also has an unique identifier, which will be used by its response to identify it.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ChoiceRequest

        public ChoiceRequest(String message,
                     List<T> choices,
                     boolean optional,
                     Class<T> type,
                     String uuid)
        Creates a new request
        Parameters:
        message - The message associated to the request
        choices - The list of objects representing the available choices
        optional - true if the request is optional, false otherwise
        type - the type of the choices
        uuid - unique identifier of the request, if not provided it will be auto-generated
